name: Last Online
description:
.... blaz3_ is online.

'hey, wuu2?'

------

Last Online is an early prototype based on exploring relationships in MMOs at the very beginning of the 2010's. When MSN was dying.

A narrative choice based experience with some roleplaying gameplay. very meta. much wow.

Phoebe Smith - Designer and Lead Writer, Artist and Programmer. (@bunnyshepard)

Rita Rosa - Lead Programmer

Adele Richards - 2D Artist, UI and Writer

Adele Meunier - UI and Enviroment Artist

Josh Dawson -  Enviroment Artist and 3D Character Artist

Ross Delaney - Character Concept Artist, 3D Character Artist, and Writer

Benedict Abbit as blaz3_

Josephine Baker as xXSK8RGAL

Phoebe Smith (@bunnyshepard) as rosie_pl4ase

-----

For Cyrus, my first friend in World of Warcraft.
